text:
<#CMXUWUY5D|hs-cms-boilerplate>  I am new to HubSpot module - have few questions
1. when working on module in local environment, we initialize the HubSpot using personal access key.....now everytime I make changes in local folder it will sync to same HubSpot portal.
Ques 1 : How do I work for multiple HubSpot portals on same machine? if I have different clients needing support on module how do I switch between different portals ?
Quest 2 : Can I sync one local module project to different HubSpot portals , if yes how? *{SOLVED]*

```By default, HubSpot will upload to the default account in your HubSpot.config,yml file. However, you can also specify an account by including a --account=<accountNameOrId> flag in the command. For example, hs upload --portal=mainProd.```
